cs671

Interface Testable


  • public interface Testable
    Testable classes. Test methods are annotated with TestMethod.
    Version:
    2.0, 01/26/14
    Author:
    Michel Charpentier
    See Also:
    TestMethod

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void afterMethod(Method m)
      Executed after each test.
      boolean beforeMethod(Method m)
      Executed before each test.

    • Method Detail

      • beforeMethod

        boolean beforeMethod(Method m)
                     throws Exception
        Executed before each test. If this method fails or return false, the corresponding test is not run.
        Parameters:
        m - the test method soon to be run
        Throws:
        Exception

      • afterMethod

        void afterMethod(Method m)
                 throws Exception
        Executed after each test. This method runs after each test, whether the test was successful or not. It does not run if the corresponding test was not run.
        Parameters:
        m - the test method that was just run
        Throws:
        Exception
